title: Request a Hot Work Permit
description: A field crew needs to perform welding in an operational area and must obtain a hot work permit from the site safety office.

tasks.description: Open the permit-to-work system and create a new request for a 'Hot Work' permit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new permit request.

tasks.description: Complete the permit form, specifying the exact location, duration of work, and personnel involved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills in all required fields on the permit form.

tasks.description: Submit the permit request, which is then routed to the area authority and the safety department for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the request, and it enters the formal approval workflow.
